use_cases.name: Add User to Okta
use_cases.description: Autonomously provisions new employee access to Okta groups on Day 1 ensuring immediate productivity without IT bottlenecks.
use_cases.value_proposition: Critical Day-1 workflow that directly addresses high-volume provisioning requests. Cuts time by 65% and frees IT from repetitive work.
workflow_steps: Get new user's email and baseline groups
Use [Get Okta User ID By Email]
Use [Add User to Group] for each group
Optional: Create Jira ticket for tracking
Confirm to user
prerequisites: Okta API token with okta.users.read and okta.groups.manage scopes
Defined baseline groups for new hires

use_cases.name: Grant Software Access via Okta
use_cases.description: Automatically grants users access to specific applications through Okta without IT intervention.
use_cases.value_proposition: High-frequency access request that clogs IT service desks. Shows immediate ROI by reducing IT overhead by 50% on one of the most common ticket types.
workflow_steps: Get user email and application name
Use [Get Okta User ID By Email]
Use [Grant User Access] to app
Optional: Create Jira ticket for audit
Confirm to user via Slack
prerequisites: Okta API token with okta.users.read and okta.apps.manage scopes
Apps configured in Okta with provisioning enabled

use_cases.name: Bulk Add Users to Okta Group
use_cases.description: Processes bulk group membership changes for multiple users simultaneously saving hours of manual work.
use_cases.value_proposition: As organizations scale, manual bulk operations become impossible. Cuts time by 65% on bulk operations that previously required spreadsheets and manual verification.
workflow_steps: Get user emails (comma-separated) and target group
For each email, use [Get Okta User ID By Email]
For each user, use [Add User to Group]
Optional: Create Jira ticket for tracking
Return summary of successful additions
prerequisites: Okta API token with appropriate scopes

use_cases.name: Group Management in Google Workspace
use_cases.description: Creates Google Workspace distribution lists and groups with initial members automatically.
use_cases.value_proposition: High-frequency operational workflow. Eliminates manual group administration overhead across Google environments.
workflow_steps: Get new group email address and members to add
Use [Create Group] (Google Workspace)
For each member, use [Add User to Group]
Optional: Create Jira ticket
Confirm group creation
prerequisites: Google Workspace service account with domain-wide delegation

use_cases.name: Offboarding Employee
use_cases.description: Executes comprehensive employee offboarding across multiple systems revoking access and notifying stakeholders.
use_cases.value_proposition: Critical security workflow that's complex and error-prone when manual. Orchestrates complete checklist autonomously across 5+ systems with zero mistakes.
workflow_steps: Get departing employee email, last day, notification list
Okta: List and remove user from all groups
Okta: Revoke all app access
Google Workspace: Remove from all groups
Slack: Send notification to admin channel
Create Jira ticket for audit trail
Confirm offboarding completion
prerequisites: API access to all connected identity systems

use_cases.name: Create Jira IT Request
use_cases.description: Enables self-service IT ticket creation with proper categorization and tracking.
use_cases.value_proposition: Self-service ticket creation eliminates form friction. Reduces ticket creation friction and improves data quality through conversational intake.
workflow_steps: Get ticket summary, description, priority
Use [Create Issue]
Use [Add Comment] for extra context
Return ticket link

use_cases.name: Create ServiceNow Request from Catalog
use_cases.description: Creates ServiceNow catalog requests for standardized hardware and software provisioning.
use_cases.value_proposition: Simplifies catalog navigation for users through conversational intake and ServiceNow submission.
workflow_steps: Get catalog item and special requirements
Use [Create Request From Catalog Item]
Use [Update Task] to add specifics if needed
Return request number

use_cases.name: Update Zoom User License
use_cases.description: Manages Zoom license assignments optimizing license costs and user access.
use_cases.value_proposition: Optimizes collaboration tool costs through automated license management with verification.
workflow_steps: Get user email and license type
Use [Update User License] (Zoom)
Optional: Create Jira ticket for tracking
Confirm license update

use_cases.name: Create Documentation in Notion
use_cases.description: Automatically creates and updates technical documentation pages in Notion based on ticket resolutions.
use_cases.value_proposition: Transforms ticket resolutions into searchable knowledge base articles, reducing repeat tickets by 30%.
workflow_steps: Extract solution details from resolved ticket
Use [Create Page] in designated Notion database
Use [Append Blocks] to add formatted content
Optional: Link ticket in tracking system
Return Notion page URL

use_cases.name: Track IT Projects in Notion
use_cases.description: Creates and updates project tracking entries in Notion databases for IT initiatives.
use_cases.value_proposition: Centralizes project visibility across IT teams with automated status updates.
workflow_steps: Get project details and timeline
Use [Query Database] to check for existing entry
Use [Create Page] or [Update Page] as needed
Add milestone tracking content
Confirm tracking setup

use_cases.name: Create Salesforce Lead from IT Request
use_cases.description: Automatically creates Salesforce leads when IT identifies potential sales opportunities from support interactions.
use_cases.value_proposition: Captures revenue opportunities that would otherwise be missed, improving IT-Sales collaboration.
workflow_steps: Extract contact and opportunity details
Use [Create Record] (Lead object)
Populate standard and custom fields
Optional: Create follow-up task
Return Lead ID and confirmation

use_cases.name: Sync IT Tickets to Salesforce Cases
use_cases.description: Creates and updates Salesforce cases for customer-impacting IT issues ensuring visibility across teams.
use_cases.value_proposition: Bridges IT and customer success teams with automated case synchronization.
workflow_steps: Identify customer-impacting ticket
Use [Create Record] (Case object)
Use [Update Record] as ticket progresses
Query for case status via [Query API]
Return case number and link

use_cases.name: Create HubSpot Contact from User Onboarding
use_cases.description: Automatically creates HubSpot contacts when new employees are onboarded, syncing IT and marketing data.
use_cases.value_proposition: Ensures marketing has complete employee data for internal communications and campaigns.
workflow_steps: Extract new hire details from onboarding request
Use [Create Contact] in HubSpot
Set lifecycle stage and properties
Optional: Enroll in onboarding workflow
Return contact ID

use_cases.name: Enroll in HubSpot Automation Workflow
use_cases.description: Enrolls contacts in HubSpot workflows based on IT events like software adoption or training completion.
use_cases.value_proposition: Automates user communication flows based on IT system interactions.
workflow_steps: Identify trigger event (e.g., training completed)
Query HubSpot for contact via [Contacts API]
Use [Enroll in Workflow] with workflow ID
Confirm enrollment status
Return enrollment confirmation

use_cases.name: Create Google Workspace Email Alias
use_cases.description: Automatically creates email aliases for users in Google Workspace based on role changes or department transfers.
use_cases.value_proposition: Streamlines email management during org changes, reducing manual admin overhead.
workflow_steps: Get user email and desired alias
Use [Directory API] to verify user exists
Use [Create Alias] endpoint
Verify alias creation
Confirm to requester

use_cases.name: Suspend Google Workspace User
use_cases.description: Temporarily suspends Google Workspace accounts for security incidents or leave of absence scenarios.
use_cases.value_proposition: Rapid security response capability for suspicious account activity or policy violations.
workflow_steps: Get user email and suspension reason
Use [Suspend User] via Directory API
Optional: Transfer data ownership
Create audit trail in Jira/ServiceNow
Notify security team via Slack

use_cases.name: Okta App Issue Troubleshooting
use_cases.description: AI-assisted troubleshooting for common Okta login and authentication issues including password resets and MFA problems.
use_cases.value_proposition: Highest volume app issue category (9.3% of all tickets). AI handles simple cases autonomously while escalating complex issues to IT staff.
workflow_steps: Identify issue type (password, MFA, app assignment)
For simple cases: Guide user through self-service resolution
For password resets: Use [Reset Password] API
For MFA issues: Use [Reset MFA] API
For complex issues: Gather diagnostics and escalate to IT
Log resolution in knowledge base
prerequisites: Okta API access with password and MFA reset permissions

use_cases.name: Salesforce App Issue Troubleshooting
use_cases.description: AI-assisted troubleshooting for common Salesforce errors and access issues with guided self-service and knowledge base access.
use_cases.value_proposition: Second highest app issue (2.7% of tickets). Reduces TTR from 3.9 hours to under 2 hours through guided troubleshooting.
workflow_steps: Identify error type and error code if available
Search knowledge base for similar issues
Guide user through common resolution steps
Check user permissions and profile settings
For unresolved cases: Create detailed ticket with diagnostics
Update knowledge base with resolution

use_cases.name: Slack App Issue Troubleshooting
use_cases.description: AI-assisted troubleshooting for Slack notification issues, channel access problems, and app integration errors.
use_cases.value_proposition: Common collaboration tool issue (1% of tickets). Provides immediate guided support reducing IT escalations.
workflow_steps: Identify issue type (notifications, channels, integrations)
For notification issues: Guide through settings check
For channel access: Verify permissions and workspace settings
For integrations: Check app installation and permissions
Provide step-by-step resolution guidance
Escalate persistent issues with full diagnostics

use_cases.name: Hardware Issue Troubleshooting
use_cases.description: AI-assisted diagnostics and troubleshooting for common hardware issues including laptop problems, peripheral issues, and performance degradation.
use_cases.value_proposition: Largest hardware category (39% of hardware tickets). AI provides step-by-step diagnostics reducing escalations by 50%.
workflow_steps: Collect symptoms and device information
Guide through standard diagnostic steps
Check for known issues and recent updates
Provide troubleshooting steps based on issue type
For unresolved issues: Create detailed ticket with diagnostics
Escalate to hardware team if replacement needed

use_cases.name: New Hardware Request Processing
use_cases.description: AI-assisted processing of new hardware requests including requirements gathering, approval routing, and procurement coordination.
use_cases.value_proposition: Streamlines hardware request intake (24.75% of hardware tickets) with intelligent form completion and approval routing.
workflow_steps: Gather hardware requirements through conversational interface
Verify user eligibility and department budget
Route to appropriate approver based on cost/type
Create procurement request in ServiceNow or Jira
Track approval status and notify requester
Update user on procurement timeline
prerequisites: Hardware catalog with specs and pricing

use_cases.name: Hardware Replacement Coordination
use_cases.description: AI-assisted coordination of hardware replacements including warranty checks, logistics scheduling, and data migration planning.
use_cases.value_proposition: Manages hardware replacement logistics (35% of hardware tickets) reducing coordination overhead and user downtime.
workflow_steps: Assess issue and determine replacement necessity
Check warranty status and coverage
Coordinate with procurement for replacement device
Schedule device swap minimizing user downtime
Provide data migration checklist and support
Track old device return and disposal

use_cases.name: VPN Access Provisioning
use_cases.description: Automated VPN access provisioning with security verification and credential management.
use_cases.value_proposition: Common security request that can be fully automated with proper approval workflows, eliminating manual credential generation.
workflow_steps: Verify user identity and employment status
Check for existing VPN access
Route through security approval if required
Generate VPN credentials via API
Send setup instructions to user
Create audit trail in security system

use_cases.name: Within-App Actions for Jira
use_cases.description: Automated Jira administrative actions like adding users to projects, changing permissions, and configuring workflows.
use_cases.value_proposition: High-volume within-app actions (1.1% of tickets) that can be fully automated through Jira APIs.
workflow_steps: Identify requested action type
Verify user has authority to request change
Execute action via Jira API (add to project, change permissions, etc)
Verify action completed successfully
Notify requester and relevant stakeholders
Create audit log entry

use_cases.name: Within-App Actions for Slack
use_cases.description: Automated Slack administrative actions like creating channels, managing permissions, and configuring webhooks.
use_cases.value_proposition: Common collaboration admin tasks (0.9% of tickets) fully automated through Slack APIs.
workflow_steps: Identify requested Slack action
Verify requestor authority
Execute via Slack API (create channel, add members, setup webhook)
Configure channel settings as requested
Notify relevant parties
Document configuration for future reference
